articles.description: A second coronavirus outbreak could emerge this winter in conjunction with the flu season to make for an even more dire health crisis, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention told The Washington Post in an interview.
articles.content:
(CNN)A second coronavirus outbreak could emerge this winter in conjunction with the flu season to make for an even more dire health crisis, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention told The Washington Post in an interview.

articles.title: Total number of L.A. County coronavirus cases tops 15,000 after significant backlog of results comes back; death toll rises to 663 - KTLA Los Angeles

articles.content:
For the second day in a row, Los Angeles County officials reported a significant backlog in positive coronavirus tests, bringing the total number to 15,140, as the death toll reached 663.
